name: Nebraska Smith and the Mask of Minkhamanna
name_original: Nebraska Smith and the Mask of Minkhamanna
description:
The famous grave robber explorer Nebraska Smith is looking for the legendary mask of Minkhamanna, which is said to give powers to the wearer.

What riches will the pyramid hide? Why is it triangular? What's the secret of Minkhamanna's mask? Help him solve every #puzzle and become a legend.

Left click: walk, interact.
Right click: examine.
Access inventory moving the cursor on the top part of the screen.
Press ESC to access the pause menu.
Text waits for clicks to continue.

A short #pointnclick #adventure game, made in 14 days for AdvJam2021.

Credits
Fabio "Guga" Guggeri - writing, design, programming, music (writing), art (backgrounds)
Maurizio "Seguso" Colucci - writing, design
Eleonora Guggeri - art (characters and items)
Fabio Attoli - music (production)
